description: Numbers n such that sigma(n) = sigma(n + 3).
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
maple: A015861:=proc(q) local n;for n from 1 to q do if sigma(n+3)=sigma(n) then print(n); fi; od; end:A015861 (10^10); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 25 2013
mathematica: Flatten[Position[Partition[DivisorSigma[1,Range[5200000]],4,1],{x_, y_, z_, x_}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 08 2011 *)Select[Range[6000000], DivisorSigma[1, #]==DivisorSigma[1, # + 3] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 10 2014 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
